description: Removes a specific tag associated with an Amazon Translate resource. For more information, see Tagging your resources.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the given Amazon Translate resource from which you want to remove the tags.

parameters.name: TagKeys
parameters.description: The initial part of a key-value pair that forms a tag being removed from a given resource. Keys must be unique and cannot be duplicated for a particular resource. (string) ---
